response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. We understand its value to you stands at $1,200,000, and based on this assessment, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a fair return for us.

We are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled benefits and efficiency. Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision.

Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction process and dedicated support throughout your journey with our product. If you require any additional details or have concerns about the terms, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
